about_the_game:
【Two realms of heaven and earth】
From low to high, the mortal world is composed of Qi refining, foundation building, gold elixir, Yuan Ying, God transforming, cave emptiness, empty Nether, robbery crossing and Mahayana; From low to high, the celestial realm is dominated by celestial beings, golden immortals, Xuanxian, Xiandi and chaos.


【Taoism follows nature】
You can refine flying swords, fans, tripods, bells, needles, flags, flags, rings, knives and other magic weapons; It can also refine hundreds of pills with different functions; Study arrays in your spare time, and arrange in advance in areas where monsters and beasts haunt; You can also engrave your unique knowledge into the talisman for emergencies.


【Spell vs boom】
In the attack mode of no lock and no standing post, you can cast spells to deal with the enemy at any time, whether on the ground or in the air. Point, range, tracking, barrier and other types of magic attacks meet your sense of operation, and truly make those who cultivate immortality happy!


【Cultivation of spiritual roots】
Metal, wood, water, fire, earth, ice, wind and thunder, the eight spiritual roots correspond to the spiritual Qi of heaven and earth. If you want to cultivate all the spiritual roots, it is necessary to take pills and weekends. The Mahayana of the spiritual root can even seize heaven and earth to kill enemies.
【Cultivate immortality at will】


About us
We are a group of players who have loved fairy stories since we were in school. We are lucky to be engaged in the game development industry after graduation. So far, we have changed from part-time to full-time development of this game. This is our starting point, but it is by no means the end point.

Minimum:
  • OS: windows7/10 64位操作系统
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4代或同级别处理器
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060或同级别显卡
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: This is a Xiuxian style role-playing game! In the game, build caves, capture spirit animals, and plant miraculous drugs. 360 degree lockless combat mode, even when flying in the sky, you can wave your long sleeve to move mountains and reclaim the sea.
